directorConfirmCorrespondenceAddressBack: Go back to 'Find the director's correspondence address'
directorConfirmCorrespondenceAddressPubl: What information we'll show on the public online register
We will show this address on the public Companies House register.
directorConfirmCorrespondenceAddressSame: My correspondence address is the same as my home address
We will not show your home address on the public register. However, if you use your home address as your correspondence address, we will show this on the public register.
If you run your company from home and do not want your home address available to the public, there is a
list of agents who can provide registered office services (opens in new tab).
A quick online search will show other agents who offer similar services. All providers will charge a fee.
